description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Quick reactions, aiming skills and an overall strategy will be needed to make Max the Frog catch all those colored flies circling his beautiful pond. The game is a completely new variation of the popular match three concept. The beautiful graphic effects and intuitive gameplay make it appealing to any age. So go ahead an find out if your tongue is quicker then the flies!
